meanings.sent1: The deadest tree in the forest had no leaves.
meanings.sent2: She wore the deadest expression on her face after hearing the bad news.
meanings.sent3: The deadest silence fell over the room when the teacher asked a difficult question.
meanings.sent4: The deadest of all the colors, black absorbs every other shade.
meanings.sent5: The deadest night of the year was when the power went out during the storm.

meanings.sent1: The deadest fish in the tank floated at the top.
meanings.sent2: After a long day at work, he felt the deadest he had ever felt.
meanings.sent3: The deadest party I've ever been to had no music or dancing.
meanings.sent4: The deadest computer screen showed no signs of life.
meanings.sent5: The deadest battery in the remote needed to be replaced urgently.

meanings.sent1: She had the deadest feeling that it was going to rain.
meanings.sent2: The deadest way to win the game was to follow the coach's strategy.
meanings.sent3: He was the deadest about his decision to quit his job and travel the world.
meanings.sent4: The deadest bet at the casino was on the number 7.
meanings.sent5: The deadest path to success is through hard work and dedication.
